text:
Ordered Brown Sugar Boba Milk Tea (L) x 2
$4.80 each, total $9.60

Quality of the drink 8/10
Customer service 5/5 - keep doing great!

Contactless such as PayWave / Tap-To-Pay is available!

Wanted to give 4.5 stars.

One of the Top Brown Sugar Boba Milk Tea, but not the Best.
had a great experience at the clementi bober tea! got the student special, staff was extremely friendly and helpful, and the drink came out quickly and is good quality

Bought the student milk tea for my kids, milk tea taste was flavourful and not too sweet, bubble was soft and chewy. They have student promo and pricing is affordable for students. Staffs are nice and helpful üëçüèªüåü
handsome worker ordered my drink politely and was quick when making it. i ordered the grapefruit green tea with aloe vera, best drink from bober! not too sweet and the flavour is impeccable.

Only one rude staff working, had to wait 10 mins even before ordering. Have to top up to change brown sugar pearls to jelly pearls even if jelly pearls are cheaper. No ice is also $1 extra. I like the drinks but way too sweet and they are getting greedier and greedier.
